1: Everyone in the world should shout joyfully to Yahweh!\q2
2:
We should worship Yahweh gladly!\q2 We should come before him singing joyful songs.


\q1
3:
We should acknowledge that Yahweh is God;\q2 it is he who made us, and so we belong to him.
\q2 We are the people that he takes care of;
\q2 we are like sheep that their shepherd cares for.



\q1
4:
Enter the gates of his temple thanking him;\q2 enter the courtyard of the temple singing songs to praise him!
\q1 Thank him and praise him
\q1
5:
because Yahweh always does good things for us.\q2 He faithfully loves us as he promised us,
\q2 and he is faithful.
